main.heading: Help!
description: Welcome to the EOSim help panel.
Hover around any area of interest and this window

open.heading: Open
description: Select the folder containing previously run mission data.

new.heading: New
description: Select an empty folder as workspace to save all the mission data.

welcome.heading: Welcome
description: Click here to go to the start page.

configure.heading: Configure
description: Define the mission parameters and solver settings.

execute.heading: Execute
description: Execute mission. Orbit propagation, coverage calculation,

visualize.heading: Visualize
description: Visualize the results of the execution by means of textual data, 2d-plots and map-plots.

opaque_atmos_height.heading: Opaque atmospheric height
description: Height in kilometers above surface of Earth beyond which line-of-sight communication can take place between pair of satellites.

mercator_proj.heading: A Mercator projection.
description:
central_longitude – The central longitude. 
min_latitude – The maximum southerly extent of the projection. 
max_latitude – The maximum northerly extent of the projection. Defaults to 84 degrees. 
latitude_true_scale  – The latitude where the scale is 1. Defaults to 0 degrees. 
false_easting – X offset from the planar origin in metres. Defaults to 0. 
false_northing  – Y offset from the planar origin in metres. Defaults to 0.
